description: This is a template with Zustand, theme switcher, and i18n
feature_requests_desc: Send your request and receive multiple offers from trusted sellers.
feature_ai_desc: An intelligent system that matches your request with the best deals.
feature_secure_desc: A protected payment system with admin verification for safer transactions.
feature_direct_desc: Chat directly with sellers and brokers to complete your deal.
role_dealer_desc: Search for your ideal car and get multiple offers from trusted sellers, and list your car for sale and connect directly with interested buyers.
role_showroom_desc: Search for your ideal car and get multiple offers from trusted sellers, and list your car for sale and connect directly with interested buyers.
role_broker_desc: Connect buyers and sellers to facilitate deals and earn commissions by matching the right cars with the right customers.
